github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: {type}({scope}): {description}. Types: feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, test, perf. Scope: affected area (api, auth, tier, i18n, a11y). Description: imperative mood, lowercase, no period. English only.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Focus on: OWASP security (SQL injection, XSS, CSRF), WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility, EU AI Act/GDPR/COPPA compliance, no PII in logs, parameterized queries only, pipe() middleware pattern for admin routes, no localStorage for user data, i18n wrapper key convention, max 250 lines per file.
